message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. This item is truly a game-changer and I believe it's worth more than what you're looking for. Given its exceptional quality and value, I propose a price of $11000 for it. I understand that this might be higher than what you initially expected, but I assure you, it's an investment that will pay off in the long run. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further information to consider this offer.
